title: I LOVE THE SERVER
body: I Was Dc'ed from a game Right now that I'm in I cant reconnect and its not my internet everything else is Working YouTube this website and people that are in game on my f list have a yellow online ... If I get a timer for this I'm not gonna be happy ..... Posting while game is Still going So you know its not my end riot :C Second Link has the time

replies.body:
same here

 hoping for the loss prevention

I wasn't able to find a record of service issues lately on NA. Can you provide more information as to what happened when the disconnection happened? Did you  receive a specific error message or see a specific behavior before the DC?
